dcterms:description: A dataset used for named entity recognition tasks, specifically for identifying gene mentions in biomedical text.
dcterms:title: BC2GM

dcterms:creator: Alexey Romanov
Chaitanya Shivade
dcterms:description: A dataset for biomedical natural language inference, containing premise-hypothesis pairs with labels indicating entailment, contradiction, or neutrality.
dcterms:title: MedNLI

dcterms:creator: Tjong Kim Sang
Fien De Meulder
dcterms:description: A general-domain dataset for named entity recognition, containing texts with entities labeled as person, location, organization, etc.
dcterms:title: CoNLL 2003

dcterms:creator: Samuel R. Bowman
Gabor Angeli
Christopher Potts
Christopher D. Manning
dcterms:description: A general-domain dataset for natural language inference, containing premise-hypothesis pairs with labels indicating entailment, contradiction, or neutrality.
dcterms:title: SNLI
